title: Files by Google gains ‘chip’ filters to help find and delete apps and games
content:
A recent update to the Files by Google app has added some handy chip search filters to help you find and delete unwanted or unused apps and games on your Android device.

more…

The post Files by Google gains ‘chip’ filters to help find and delete apps and games appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Files by Google has added handy 'chip' search filters to help make it even easier to determine which apps and games you should delete.
